content:
I noticed today that when I defined Set.infsep, I did so using Set dot notation. But this is inconsistent with the approach used for, say, Metric.diam, or EMetric.infdist, or suchlike.

As such, #10129 is a wholesale refactor of this file to remove the excessive dot notation, which I put in originally and I now regret.

I understand this diff may be too large to practically review. I am not then sure what to do - because this inconsistency does really annoy me!
